timeline.message:
Remove `unsafe impl Send for HDDlog`.

This unsafe `impl` was a workaround for older DD not implementing `Send`
for `WorkerGuard`s.  This is no longer necessary with the latest timely/DD.

arrange.rs: Remove `concatenate_collections`.

The function was introduced a while ago as an efficient method of
merging many collections.  DD has since exposed the same functionality
through its `Collection` API.

timeline.author: mbudiu-vmw

timeline.message:
Remove callback argument.

Removed the callback argument from `HDDlog::run`, `ddlog_run`, and
language bindings based on `ddlog_run`.  This callback is confusing
and difficult to use: it can be invoked from multiple threads and can
delete and remove the same record multiple times, and in arbitrary
order. The the `commit_dump_changes` API provides a better
way to track changes to output collections (at the cost of buffering
them).

Fix lints in `distributed_ddlog::accumulate`.

The `accumulate` module is now public, which triggered a bunch of
new lints.

Fix lints in `distributed_ddlog::accumulate`.

The `accumulate` module is now public, which triggered a bunch of
new lints.
